title: ÁßªËøú √ó È£ûÂÇ≤ÔºöÁªôHiFiËÆæÂ§áÂä†ÁÇπ"Êô∫ËÉΩBuff" - Êé®Ëçê - C114ÈÄö‰ø°ÁΩë
text:
‰º†ÁªüHiFiÊí≠ÊîæÂô®ÁöÑÈÇ£‰∫õÁ≥üÂøÉ‰∫ãÔºå‰Ω†ÊòØ‰∏çÊòØ‰πüÈÅáËøáÔºüÁ≥ªÁªüÂ∞ÅÈó≠Ôºå‰∏ªÊµÅÈü≥‰πêAPPÊ†πÊú¨Áî®‰∏ç‰∫ÜÔºõÊ≠åÊõ≤‰ø°ÊÅØÊ∑∑‰π±ÔºåÊâãÂä®Êï¥ÁêÜÂà∞ÊäìÁãÇÔºõÊÉ≥Â∏¶Âá∫Èó®ÔºåÂèàË¢´‚ÄúÁ†ñÂ§¥‚Äù‰ººÁöÑ‰ΩìÁßØÂäùÈÄÄ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶Âà´ÊÖåÔºåHiFiËÆæÂ§áÁöÑÊô∫ËÉΩÊó∂‰ª£ÔºåÂ∑≤ÊÇÑÊÇÑÊù•‰∏¥„ÄÇ
‰Ωú‰∏∫ÂÖ®ÁêÉÈ¢ÜÂÖàÁöÑAIoTÊï¥‰ΩìËß£ÂÜ≥ÊñπÊ°à‰æõÂ∫îÂïÜÔºåÁßªËøúÈÄö‰ø°‰∏éÂÖ®ÁêÉHiFiÂ§¥ÈÉ®ÂìÅÁâåÈ£ûÂÇ≤ÔºàFIIOÔºâÊ∑±Â∫¶Âêà‰ΩúÔºåÂü∫‰∫éÁßªËøúÈ´òÁ´Ø 4G Êô∫ËÉΩÊ®°ÁªÑSC200VÔºåÊâìÈÄ†ÁöÑÈ£ûÂÇ≤‰æøÊê∫È´òÊ∏ÖÊó†ÊçüÈü≥‰πêÊí≠ÊîæÂô®M21Á≥ªÂàóÔºå‰∏ç‰ªÖÂÆûÁé∞‰∫ÜÂºÄÊîæÂºèAndroidÁ≥ªÁªü‰∏ãÂÖ®ÁêÉ ÊµÅÂ™í‰Ωì È´òËß£ÊûêÈü≥È¢ëÁõ¥Âá∫ÔºåÊõ¥‰ª• AI Ê≠åÊõ≤‰ø°ÊÅØË°•ÂÖ®„ÄÅ‰∏™ÊÄßÂåñÈü≥Êïà„ÄÅÂ§çÂè§UIËÅîÂä®Á≠âÂàõÊñ∞AIÂäüËÉΩÔºåÊàê‰∏∫Êú™Êù•HiFiËÆæÂ§áÁöÑÂÖ®Êñ∞Ê†áÊùÜ„ÄÇ
ÁßªËøúÈÄö‰ø° COO Âº†Ê†ãË°®Á§∫ Ôºö‚ÄúÂú® Áâ©ËÅîÁΩë ÊäÄÊúØÊ∑±Â∫¶Ê∏óÈÄèÊ∂àË¥πÁîµÂ≠êÁöÑ‰ªäÂ§©ÔºåHiFi ËÆæÂ§áÁöÑÊô∫ËÉΩÂåñ‰∏çÊòØÈÄâÊã©È¢òÔºåËÄåÊòØÂøÖÁ≠îÈ¢ò„ÄÇÁßªËøú‰∏éÈ£ûÂÇ≤ÁöÑÂêà‰ΩúÔºåÈÄöËøáSC200VÂ∞ÜÁâ©ËÅîÁΩëÁöÑËøûÊé•ËÉΩÂäõ„ÄÅAI ÁÆóÂäõ‰∏é‰∏ì‰∏öÈü≥È¢ëÊäÄÊúØÊ∑±Â∫¶ ËûçÂêà Ôºå‰∏ç‰ªÖÁ≤æÂáÜÁ†¥Ëß£‰∫ÜÁî®Êà∑Âú®‰º†ÁªüHiFiËÆæÂ§á‰ΩøÁî®ËøáÁ®ã‰∏≠ÁöÑÁóõÁÇπÈóÆÈ¢òÔºåÊõ¥ÈÄöËøáÂ∫ïÂ±ÇÊäÄÊúØÂàõÊñ∞ÔºåÈáçÊñ∞ÂÆö‰πâ‰æøÊê∫ HiFi ÁöÑ‰∫ßÂìÅÂΩ¢ÊÄÅ„ÄÇ‚Äù
È£û ÂÇ≤ËÅîÂêà ÂàõÂßã‰∫∫ KeanÊåáÂá∫ Ôºö‚ÄúÂèëÁÉßÂèãÂØπ‚ÄòÊûÅËá¥Èü≥Ë¥®‚ÄôÁöÑËøΩÊ±Ç‰ªéÊú™ÊîπÂèòÔºå‰ΩÜÊñ∞Êó∂‰ª£ÁöÑ HiFi ËÆæÂ§áÔºåÂøÖÈ°ªÂ≠¶‰ºö‚ÄòËÅ™ÊòéÂú∞‚ÄôÊª°Ë∂≥ÈúÄÊ±Ç„ÄÇÈ£ûÂÇ≤‰∏éÁßªËøúÁöÑÂêà‰ΩúÔºåËÆ© M21 Á≥ªÂàóÊó¢Á≠ëÁâ¢‰∫Ü‚ÄòÊó†ÊçüÈü≥Ë¥®‚ÄôÁöÑÊ†πÂü∫ÔºåÂèàÈÄöËøáÂºÄÊîæÁ≥ªÁªü„ÄÅAI ÂäüËÉΩÊâìÁ†¥‰∫Ü‰º†Áªü HiFi ÁöÑÂú∫ÊôØÂ±ÄÈôê„ÄÇËøô‰∏çÊòØÁÆÄÂçïÁöÑÂäüËÉΩÂè†Âä†ÔºåËÄåÊòØÁî®ÊäÄÊúØÂçèÂêåÂÆûÁé∞‚Äò1+1>2‚ÄôÁöÑ‰ΩìÈ™åË∑ÉÂçá„ÄÇËøôÊ≠£ÊòØÊñ∞‰∏Ä‰ª£HiFiËØ•ÊúâÁöÑÊ†∑Â≠ê„ÄÇ‚Äù
È£ûÂÇ≤ M21Á≥ªÂàóÔºöÂºÄÊîæÊô∫ËÉΩ+Â∞èÂ∑ß‰æøÊê∫ÔºåÈ¢†Ë¶ÜHiFi‰ΩìÈ™å

Âú®ÁßªËøúSC200VÁöÑÂä†ÊåÅ‰∏ãÔºåM21Á≥ªÂàóÊê≠ËΩΩÂºÄÊîæÂºèAndroid 13Á≥ªÁªüÔºå‰∏ç‰ªÖÂ∞ÜÂÖ®ÂäõÊîØÊåÅFIIOÊú™Êù•ÁöÑAndroidÁâàÊú¨ÂçáÁ∫ßËÆ°ÂàíÔºåËøòËÉΩÂæàÂ•ΩÂú∞ÂÖºÂÆπÂÖ®ÁêÉ‰∏ªÊµÅÈü≥‰πêAPPÂèäÂêéÁª≠ÁâàÊú¨Ëø≠‰ª£„ÄÇ

ËÄåSC200VÊê≠ËΩΩÁöÑÈ´òÈÄöSM6225Âπ≥Âè∞ÔºåÈááÁî®6nmÂà∂Á®ãÂ∑•Ëâ∫ÔºåÂú®ÂÖ∑Â§áÂº∫Â§ßÂ§ÑÁêÜËÉΩÂäõÁöÑÂêåÊó∂ÊòæÂäüËÄóÊòæËëó‰∏ãÈôçÔºåËøô‰ΩøÂæóM21Á≥ªÂàóÂú®ÂÖºÈ°æÊÄßËÉΩÁöÑÂêåÊó∂ÂèàÊúâÁùÄÂ∞èÂ∑ßËΩª‰æøÁöÑË∫´Ë∫ØÔºåÂΩªÂ∫ïËß£ÂÜ≥‰∫ÜÁî®Êà∑Âá∫Èó®Êê∫Â∏¶ÁöÑÁóõÁÇπ„ÄÇ

author: Get News
title: RPC SERVICES LLC Shares Why Some Roofing Replacement Projects Cost More than Others | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
RPC SERVICES LLC is a top-rated roofing contractor. In a recent update, the company highlighted why some roof replacement projects cost more than others. Newtown Square, PA - In a website post, RPC SERVICES LLC outlined why some roof replacement projects cost more than others.
The roofing contractor Newtown Square advised that the complexity of the roofing project greatly impacts the cost. Some roofs may require more materials or labor due to their shape, size, or angle. Additionally, if the roof has multiple layers that need to be removed before the new one is installed, this will add to the overall cost of the project.
The roofer contractor Newtown Square added that the type and quality of materials used for the replacement can also impact the cost. High-quality materials will naturally cost more than lower-quality ones. However, they also tend to be more durable and last longer. Cheaper materials may save upfront costs, but they may need to be replaced more frequently.
Lastly, the roofer Newtown Square noted the location of the home can also play a role in the cost of a roofing replacement project. Factors such as accessibility and local regulations can affect the cost of labor and materials. For example, suppose the home is located in a remote area with limited access to heavy equipment. In that case, it may require additional labor and resources to complete the project.
About RPC SERVICES LLC
RPC SERVICES LLC is a leading roofing contractor committed to delivering reliable and long-lasting results for all roofing projects. With a team of experienced professionals and a commitment to using the best materials, RPC SERVICES LLC ensures that every project is completed to the utmost satisfaction of its clients. Their expertise and attention to detail have made them a trusted name in the roofing industry, and they are committed to delivering reliable and cost-effective solutions to their clients.
Media Contact

author: Business Wire
title: Newmont Completes $20 Million Global Community Support Fund, Partnering with Communities for Greater Resilience Post-Pandemic | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
Global Community Support Fund demonstrates commitment to social responsibility and strengthening community engagement
Newmont Corporation (NYSE: NEM, TSX: NGT, ASX: NEM, PNGX: NEM) proudly announces the successful completion of the $20 million Global Community Support Fund (the Fund), established in April 2020 in response to the unprecedented challenges posed by the global pandemic. The objective of this fund was to provide critical financial resources to host communities where Newmont operates, targeting funds to address immediate impacts of the global pandemic while catalyzing long-term resiliency and future community development.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240404566254/en/
‚ÄúAfter almost four years since its launch, we are pleased to announce the successful closure of the Global Community Support Fund, which reflects our ongoing commitment to partnering with the communities where we operate,‚Äù said Suzy Retallack, Chief Safety and Sustainability Officer at Newmont. ‚ÄúThe Fund‚Äôs impact has been far-reaching, contributing to the collective efforts of communities to overcome the challenges posed by the pandemic and innovate for greater resilience in the future.‚Äù
Over the past 3.5 years, Newmont has partnered with more than 420 local governments, medical institutions, charities, and non-governmental organizations to strategically allocate funds effectively. The $20 million Fund has been instrumental in supporting a wide range of initiatives, focused on health, food security and economic resilience:
$1.4 million donated to the Regional Hospital of Cajamarca, providing ventilators, incubators, monitoring equipment, COVID-19 tests and personal protective equipment (PPE). $500,000 donation matched by the Colorado Health Foundation resulting in a $1 million total donation to the Colorado Community Support Fund to support community health and prevention for underserved populations in the state. $300,000 donated to the American Red Cross Global Disaster Preparedness Center to support research and local-level grants for emergency response community resilience. $304,000 donated to the Cree Trappers' Association in Quebec to provide food security to vulnerable people and employment for traditional harvesters in the nine communities of Eeyou Istchee. $734,000 donated to the Kumasi Centre for Collaborative Research in Ghana to establish two new laboratories in the host communities of Ahafo and Akyem along with COVID-19 tests and testing equipment to expand their testing capacity for COVID-19 and other infectious diseases. $968,000 donated to Suriname‚Äôs Ministry of Health to launch the Recovery and Resilience Project in partnership with Crown Agents to strengthen Suriname‚Äôs health system, reduce non-communicable diseases (NCDs) and COVID-19 burdens, and enhance emergency response capabilities. "As part of our commitment to addressing the challenges posed by non-communicable diseases (NCDs) and the impact of COVID-19 in Suriname, Crown Agents, the Ministry of Health and Newmont formed an impactful partnership on the Recovery and Resilience Project. Together, we worked to strengthen Suriname's health system, alleviate the burden of NCDs and COVID-19, and enhance emergency response capabilities,‚Äù says Sarah Hepworth, Chief Programmes Officer at Crown Agents. ‚ÄúOur focus on strengthening NCD services, promoting vaccination uptake, and addressing healthcare worker hesitancy underscores our dedication to improving the well-being of the people of Suriname. Crown Agents is proud to collaborate with Newmont and the Ministry of Health to contribute to the health and resilience of Suriname."
Newmont remains committed to its core values of safety, sustainability, and responsibility, and the successful implementation of the Global Community Support Fund underpins the company‚Äôs purpose to create value and improve lives through sustainable and responsible mining.
About Newmont
Newmont is the world‚Äôs leading gold company and a producer of copper, zinc, lead, and silver. The company‚Äôs world-class portfolio of assets, prospects and talent is anchored in favorable mining jurisdictions in Africa, Australia, Latin America & Caribbean, North America, and Papua New Guinea. Newmont is the only gold producer listed in the S&P 500 Index and is widely recognized for its principled environmental, social, and governance practices. Newmont is an industry leader in value creation, supported by robust safety standards, superior execution, and technical expertise. Founded in 1921, the company has been publicly traded since 1925.
At Newmont, our purpose is to create value and improve lives through sustainable and responsible mining. To learn more about Newmont‚Äôs sustainability strategy and initiatives, go to www.newmont.com .
View source version on businesswire.com: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20240404566254/en/
Contacts Media Contact
Jennifer Pakradooni
Globalcommunications@newmont.com

author: CNN Newsource
title: Massive California waves injure some onlookers and bring flooding, treacherous beach conditions up the West coast
text:
Massive California waves injure some onlookers and bring flooding, treacherous beach conditions up the West coast
By Elizabeth Wolfe, Robert Shackelford and Cindy Von Quednow, CNN
(CNN) ‚Äî A powerful offshore storm is
driving towering waves into the California coastline, triggering flooding and urgent warnings from officials of swells that could damage piers and boats and threaten onlookers, after several people were injured by a wave along Ventura beach on Thursday.
Nearly 20 people were swept away by a wave that crashed into onlookers standing behind a barrier along the southern California beach, and eight people were taken to the hospital, Ventura officials said.
Some parts of the California coast will see high water and dangerous rip currents through the weekend as the large waves keep rolling in. Coastal flood and high-surf alerts cover much of the West coast from the US-Mexico border to southern Oregon on Friday, the National Weather Service said.
San Francisco could see waves as high as telephone poles ‚Äî up to 40 feet ‚Äî through Friday morning. Fifteen to 20-foot waves are expected in the central coast.
The dangerous conditions pose an ‚Äúexceptional risk‚Äù of ocean drowning and damage to structures like piers and jetties, the National Weather Service said.
The spectacular waters have enthralled some surfers and onlookers, but weather officials are cautioning that the waves and strong rip tides can be perilous for those nearby.
‚ÄúLarge breaking waves can cause injury, wash people off beaches and rocks, and capsize small boats near shore,‚Äù the National Weather Service warned.
At least one fisherman fell overboard in a harbor off Oxnard and later came ashore uninjured, the Ventura County Fire Department said.
The conditions have already caused some road closures and evacuations in coastal California communities and prompted the rescue of five campers along the San Luis Obispo coast.
Some coastal streets in Ventura have been closed as a precaution. In order to discourage spectators, officials also closed a main access point to Ventura Pier, which saw a swell of about 20 feet on Thursday.
In central California‚Äôs Santa Cruz, the sheriff‚Äôs office
issued an evacuation warning for some areas on Thursday, which included areas of Rio Del Mar, where seawater filled beachside roadways and pushed against some homes, CNN affiliate KION reported. The warnings were lifted later in the day.
The most extreme impacts were expected along the central and Ventura County coasts, along with Hermosa, Manhattan and Palos Verdes beaches, the weather service in Los Angeles said Thursday.
But Northern California will not be spared.
The Bay Area is under a high wind alert Friday and could see gusts of up to 50 mph. The weather service warned Thursday that the area could see waves of 28 to 33 feet.
Rain is also expected to fall on the Bay Area and areas north of it throughout the day Friday before spreading south on Saturday.
Massive waves attract surfers to Mavericks
Despite safety warnings, the massive waves are a welcome sight to surfers hungry to tackle the legendary swells at Mavericks Beach, about 25 miles south of San Francisco.
Pro surfers and spectators flocked to the beach on Thursday for a competition at the beach known for having
some of the biggest waves in the world, CNN affiliate KGO reported.
Local resident Ion Banner
told the affiliate that surfers from Brazil, Tahiti and Hawaii were out in the water. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs pretty gnarly, it‚Äôs super big,‚Äù he said.
‚ÄúThe waves looked absolutely massive and it was everything that we expected,‚Äù said Miguel Blanco, who told KGO he flew in from Portugal to surf the waves. ‚ÄúIt was really big, I‚Äôd say 40-60 foot waves.‚Äù
‚ÄúIf it‚Äôs your turn, you just gotta go,‚Äù Blanco said. ‚ÄúWhen you see a big wave, you‚Äôre kinda scared but at the same time you‚Äôre feeling like you should go and you just go and enjoy the ride.‚Äù
CNN‚Äôs David Williams contributed to this report.

author: erik Pastoris
title: Homem mais velho do mundo √© brasileiro e recebe aposentadoria do INSS h√° 46 anos
text:
O cearense Jo√£o Marinho Neto, o homem mais velho do mundo com 112 anos, recebe aposentadoria h√° 46 anos, de acordo com dados do Instituto Nacional do Seguro Social (INSS) divulgados nesta quinta-feira (23). Segundo o LongeviQuest, usado pelo Guinness, o brasileiro completou 112 anos em novembro do ano passado. Anteriormente, ele era reconhecido como o homem vivo mais velho do Brasil e da Am√©rica Latina.
Al√©m disso, Jo√£o √© o √∫ltimo homem sobrevivente nascido no ano de 1912 e reside em Apuiar√©s (CE), a cerca de 250 km de Fortaleza. Jo√£o nasceu em 5 de outubro de 1912, em Maranguape (CE). Desde 1978, recebe o benef√≠cio de aposentadoria de empregador rural, atividade principal do dono do recorde mundial de longevidade. Jo√£o passou a receber o benef√≠cio aos 66 anos.
Atualmente, o recordista mora em um lar de idosos em uma cidade que n√£o possui ag√™ncia da Previd√™ncia Social devido ao baixo n√∫mero de habitantes. A unidade mais pr√≥xima fica em Pentecostes (CE), a cerca de 30 km, onde √© mantida a aposentadoria de Jo√£o.
O INSS n√£o vai suspender benef√≠cios pagos a aposentados e pensionistas que n√£o fizerem a prova de vida. Uma portaria, assinada pelo Minist√©rio da Previd√™ncia (MPS), publicada no Di√°rio Oficial da Uni√£o (DOU) na √∫ltima sexta-feira (17), pontua que nenhum benef√≠cio seja bloqueado por seis meses, prorrog√°veis por igual per√≠odo.
Segundo a institui√ß√£o, a prova de vida √© realizada anualmente pelo pr√≥prio INSS desde 2023 e n√£o √© mais necess√°rio que os benefici√°rios fa√ßam o procedimento indo pessoalmente aos postos de atendimento.
O √≥rg√£o utiliza consulta de dados recebidos de outras institui√ß√µes p√∫blicas federais para realizar cruzamento de informa√ß√µes dos cidad√£os e comprovar se est√£o ou n√£o vivos. At√© o momento, cerca de 93% dos dados foram checados.
Aposentadoria em 2025
Desde que a reforma da Previd√™ncia foi aprovada em 2019, parte das regras para se aposentar mudam todo ano para um determinado grupo de contribuintes. Em 2025, n√£o ser√° diferente.
Na regra geral, √© exigido que:
‚Äì As mulheres se aposentem com idade m√≠nima de 62 anos e pelo menos 15 anos de contribui√ß√£o;
‚Äì Os homens devem ter idade m√≠nima de 65 anos, com 20 anos de contribui√ß√£o.
‚Äì As mudan√ßas fazem parte da regra de transi√ß√£o da reforma. Quem j√° contribu√≠a com o INSS antes da aprova√ß√£o do projeto, em novembro de 2019, enfrenta altera√ß√µes anuais nas regras para aposentadoria at√© 2031.
Em 2025, essas s√£o as principais mudan√ßas:
‚Äì A idade m√≠nima para solicitar a aposentadoria sobe seis meses em rela√ß√£o ao regime anterior. As mulheres precisam ter, no m√≠nimo, 59 anos. Para os homens, a idade m√≠nima passa a ser de 64 anos.
‚Äì O tempo m√≠nimo de contribui√ß√£o √© de 30 anos para as mulheres e de 35 para os homens.
‚Äì Tamb√©m h√° mudan√ßas na regra dos pontos, que soma o tempo de contribui√ß√£o com a idade do trabalhador. A pontua√ß√£o m√≠nima exigida ser√° de 92 para mulheres e de 102 pontos para homens.
As regras de transi√ß√£o s√£o voltadas para quem j√° contribu√≠a antes da aprova√ß√£o da reforma da Previd√™ncia, e foram criadas para estabelecer uma passagem entre as exig√™ncias antigas e as atuais do benef√≠cio.
Cada uma delas pode alterar o momento em que o benef√≠cio ser√° concedido e o valor que o trabalhador receber√°. Assim, o contribuinte pode se aposentar a partir da regra que for mais ben√©fica para ele. Com informa√ß√µes dos portais de not√≠cias CNN Brasil e g1.

author: Letara Draghia
title: UK air traffic outage due to password problem ¬´ Euro Weekly News
text: Mission Statement: to assist the integration of foreign residents living in Spain By Letara Draghia ‚Ä¢ Updated: 15 Nov 2024 ‚Ä¢ 0:15 ‚Ä¢ 2 minutes read NATS logo. Credit: Shutterstock, T.Schneider A report by the Civil Aviation Authority (CAA) has revealed that a technical glitch, combined with a password access delay, caused major disruption to UK air travel over the August Bank Holiday in 2023, affecting more than 700,000 passengers. Were you one of the customers affected by this? The outage began when a flight from Los Angeles to Paris used the three-letter code ‚ÄúDVL,‚Äù representing both Deauville in France and Devil‚Äôs Lake in North Dakota. This rare code duplication confused the National Air Traffic Services (NATS) system, causing it to enter maintenance mode to prevent processing incorrect data. Within moments, the backup system also encountered the same issue, leaving air traffic controllers to process flights manually. The CAA report noted that NATS contacted a Level 2 engineer 30 minutes after the fault occurred, but a password verification problem prevented the engineer from accessing the system remotely. As a result, the engineer had to travel onsite, which delayed the recovery by nearly three hours. Full functionality wasn‚Äôt restored until 14:30 that day. The technical glitch and subsequent delay resulted in over 2,000 cancelled flights on August 28-29, affecting around 300,000 passengers. Approximately 95,000 additional travellers experienced significant delays, while others faced shorter disruptions. The report estimates the cost of the disruption to airlines and passengers at ¬£75-100 million (‚Ç¨90-120 million). The incident involved major airlines including British Airways, easyJet, Jet2, Ryanair, TUI, Virgin Atlantic, and Wizz Air. easyJet Chief Executive Johan Lundgren expressed frustration, saying, ‚ÄúAirlines and passengers were severely let down by NATS due to its failure of resilience and lack of planning. Airlines were then left picking up the pieces and costs, which ran into millions,‚Äù as reported by the BBC. Following the incident, NATS has implemented many of the CAA‚Äôs recommendations, including improved crisis planning, increased onsite engineering, better remote troubleshooting, and enhanced passenger protections. A NATS spokesperson apologised, acknowledging the inconvenience and confirming that the specific glitch had been permanently fixed. This incident serves as a reminder for British expats and frequent travellers to prepare for unexpected disruptions when flying to and from the UK. Read the full CAA report. Share this story Subscribe to our Euro Weekly News alerts to get the latest stories into your inbox! By signing up, you will create a Euro Weekly News account if you don't already have one. Review our Privacy Policy for more information about our privacy practices. Part-time writer, wife, and mother from the UK. Living an enjoyable life in southern Spain. author: Thais Bueno Cirino
title: Arteta classifica derrota do Arsenal como "decepcionante" e despista sobre novos refor√ßos - Gazeta Esportiva
text: Arteta classifica derrota do Arsenal como "decepcionante" e despista sobre novos refor√ßos Por Reda√ß√£o 28/12/2023 √†s 21:36 ‚Ä¢ Atualizado: 28/12/2023 √†s 21:38 S√£o Paulo, SP Nesta quinta-feira, o "Quero parabenizar o West Ham e elogiar meus jogadores, √© s√≥ isso que posso dizer. Isso √© o futebol. Voc√™ v√™ o que fizemos durante o jogo, como criamos... e o resultado √© decepcionante, mas eles foram melhores que n√≥s em ambas as √°reas. Eles tiveram dois chutes no gol, tr√™s se contar o p√™nalti, e n√≥s tivemos 30", afirmou o espanhol em coletiva p√≥s-jogo. Arteta ainda complementou: "No futebol, voc√™ precisa fazer isso melhor (finalizar) se quiser vencer. Hoje, n√£o ganhamos por conta disso. De resto, o time continuou tentando e teve uma √≥tima atitude novamente". O comandante dos Gunners tamb√©m disse que acredita que a m√° fase do ataque n√£o esteja relacionada √† falta de confian√ßa dos atletas. "Voc√™ chuta na trave, ou voc√™ finaliza e a bola n√£o entra por meio cent√≠metro, ou algu√©m bloqueia o chute e a bola n√£o entra. Tamb√©m perdemos muitas oportunidades na escolha do √∫ltimo passe. Isso faz a diferen√ßa para vencer os jogos". Quando questionado se o "O que temos s√£o estes jogadores, e s√£o estes atletas que eu amo muito. O que temos que fazer √© nos colocarmos em situa√ß√µes melhores e treinar mais. Temos que coloc√°-los l√° e aumentar a confian√ßa deles, porque eles j√° fizeram grandes coisas", concluiu. O Arsenal foi ultrapassado pelo [Arsenal desperdi√ßou a chance](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/campeonatos/premier-league/arsenal-perde-do-west-ham-e-desperdica-chance-de-tirar-liverpool-da-lideranca-do-ingles/)de reassumir a lideran√ßa da Premier League. Pela 19¬™ rodada, os Gunners foram derrotados pelo West Ham, em casa, por 2 a 0. Os mandantes acumularam 30 finaliza√ß√µes contra o advers√°rio, e, por isso, o t√©cnico Mikel Arteta classificou o resultado como "decepcionante". "Quero parabenizar o West Ham e elogiar meus jogadores, √© s√≥ isso que posso dizer. Isso √© o futebol. Voc√™ v√™ o que fizemos durante o jogo, como criamos... e o resultado √© decepcionante, mas eles foram melhores que n√≥s em ambas as √°reas. Eles tiveram dois chutes no gol, tr√™s se contar o p√™nalti, e n√≥s tivemos 30", afirmou o espanhol em coletiva p√≥s-jogo. Arteta ainda complementou: "No futebol, voc√™ precisa fazer isso melhor (finalizar) se quiser vencer. Hoje, n√£o ganhamos por conta disso. De resto, o time continuou tentando e teve uma √≥tima atitude novamente". O comandante dos Gunners tamb√©m disse que acredita que a m√° fase do ataque n√£o esteja relacionada √† falta de confian√ßa dos atletas. "Voc√™ chuta na trave, ou voc√™ finaliza e a bola n√£o entra por meio cent√≠metro, ou algu√©m bloqueia o chute e a bola n√£o entra. Tamb√©m perdemos muitas oportunidades na escolha do √∫ltimo passe. Isso faz a diferen√ßa para vencer os jogos". Quando questionado se o [Arsenal](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/times/arsenal)iria atr√°s de algum jogador para resolver os problemas de convers√£o de chances, o treinador despistou e deixou claro que est√° feliz com o elenco que tem em m√£os. "O que temos s√£o estes jogadores, e s√£o estes atletas que eu amo muito. O que temos que fazer √© nos colocarmos em situa√ß√µes melhores e treinar mais. Temos que coloc√°-los l√° e aumentar a confian√ßa deles, porque eles j√° fizeram grandes coisas", concluiu. O Arsenal foi ultrapassado pelo [Liverpool](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/times/liverpool), que venceu e alcan√ßou 42 pontos no [Ingl√™s](https://www.gazetaesportiva.com/campeonatos/premier-league). Com 40, o time de Londres terminou a rodada na segunda coloca√ß√£o. O pr√≥ximo desafio da equipe de Arteta ser√° neste domingo, √†s 11 horas (de Bras√≠lia), contra o Fulham, em Craven Cottage. üí¨ "We have to learn from it and make sure we get sharper and better in front of the goals." Our skipper on the missed chances tonight üëá ‚Äî Arsenal (@Arsenal) [December 29, 2023]

author: Francisco V√™neto
title: Cat√≥licos da Espanha, sob governo socialista, precisam lutar pelo direito de rezar na rua
text: Em abril de 2022, a coliga√ß√£o social-comunista que hoje governa a Espanha sob a presid√™ncia de Pedro S√°nchez aprovou uma mudan√ßa no C√≥digo Penal do pa√≠s para intimidar quem reza o ter√ßo e e oferece apoio √†s gestantes nas proximidades dos neg√≥cios de aborto. As penas previstas s√£o de tr√™s meses a um ano de cadeia para quem for julgado culpado de ‚Äúdificultar o exerc√≠cio do direito √† interrup√ß√£o volunt√°ria da gravidez ou de assediar uma mulher atrav√©s de atos irritantes, ofensivos, intimidantes ou coercivos que ponham em causa a sua liberdade‚Äù. Em resumo: o governo S√°nchez cerceia direitos b√°sicos, como o de ir e vir, o de express√£o e o de religi√£o, em nome de alegados direitos que n√£o existem, como o de exterminar livremente beb√™s em suas fases iniciais de desenvolvimento. Aberra√ß√µes ideol√≥gicas id√™nticas tamb√©m s√£o perpetradas em outros pa√≠ses, como o Reino Unido, onde cidad√£os t√™m sido presos at√© mesmo por ‚Äúsupostamente estarem rezando‚Äù, em sil√™ncio (!), nas proximidades de neg√≥cios da ind√∫stria do aborto. Entre os alvos da mudan√ßa na lei espanhola est√£o a iniciativa 40 Dias pela Vida, que realiza campanhas de ora√ß√£o perto de cl√≠nicas de aborto, e os grupos de volunt√°rios que oferecem ajuda √†s mulheres em situa√ß√£o de risco de aborto nas proximidades desses mesmos centros. Como rea√ß√£o aos abusos ideol√≥gicos do governo de esquerda, cidad√£os espanh√≥is lan√ßaram iniciativas como a plataforma ‚ÄúRezar n√£o √© crime‚Äù. Entrevistado pela ag√™ncia de not√≠cias [Europa Press](https://www.europapress.es/sociedad/noticia-portavoz-obispos-amnistia-si-no-respetamos-imperio-ley-alternativa-tirania-20231226090248.html) sobre uma ampla gama de assuntos, o bispo dom Francisco C√©sar Garc√≠a Mag√°n, auxiliar de Toledo e porta-voz da Confer√™ncia Episcopal Espanhola (CEE), defendeu o direito dos fi√©is de rezarem na rua: ‚ÄúN√£o s√≥ temos o direito de rezar aqui, em casa ou na igreja, desde que, obviamente, de modo pac√≠fico e sem atacar ningu√©m e sem que ningu√©m nos ataque, mas tamb√©m temos o direito de rezar em pra√ßa p√∫blica, respeitando as normas administrativas‚Äù. Cat√≥licos t√™m se reunido para rezar em p√∫blico diante do Santu√°rio da Imaculada Concei√ß√£o, em Madri, desde o dia 12 de novembro, como parte dos protestos contra o governo socialista. No final do mesmo m√™s, o governo de Madri tentou impedir a manifesta√ß√£o alegando que a comunica√ß√£o sobre a concentra√ß√£o n√£o cumpria os requisitos de urg√™ncia previstos pela legisla√ß√£o, mas a presen√ßa de fi√©is tem sido ininterrupta mesmo assim. No dia 8 de dezembro, festa da Imaculada Concei√ß√£o, que √© padroeira da Espanha, cat√≥licos se reuniram para rezar em mais de cem locais.
